data.lyric:
[ti:Better Man]
[ar:Westlife]
[al:Better Man]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Better Man - Westlife (西城男孩)
[00:01.28]Lyrics by：Steve Mac/Ed Sheeran/Fred Gibson
[00:02.57]Composed by：Steve Mac/Ed Sheeran/Fred Gibson
[00:03.86]You and I had something special baby
[00:10.25]Something that you only see on movie screens I know
[00:16.71]Lately I've been missing you like crazy
[00:20.78]Oh I
[00:23.07]Why'd you let me in just to let me go
[00:29.46]Most guys'll get high when feeling low
[00:32.66]But I don't think that that's the way to go
[00:35.80]Sometimes I'll be sitting on my own
[00:38.66]Thinking 'bout life thinking 'bout you and me
[00:42.70]How do you lose the one you love
[00:45.45]After giving it all you gave it up
[00:48.94]Well maybe my love wasn't enough
[00:52.06]You think you know but you never can
[00:55.40]How do you lose your only plan
[00:58.42]Well darling just give me one more chance
[01:01.68]And I'll give you everything I have
[01:04.83]I'll try to be a better man
[01:11.57]I felt things when we were naked
[01:17.82]I saw an angel but they've hidden their wings I know
[01:24.25]Everyone's got that special baby
[01:27.81]Oh I
[01:30.56]Now I only see you in my dreams
[01:36.74]Most guys'll get high when feeling low
[01:39.84]But I don't think that that's the way to go
[01:42.91]Sometimes I'll be sitting on my own
[01:45.79]Thinking 'bout life thinking 'bout you and me
[01:49.74]How do you lose the one you love
[01:52.61]After giving it all you gave it up
[01:56.10]Well maybe my love wasn't enough
[01:59.22]You think you know but you never can
[02:02.54]How do you lose your only plan
[02:05.70]Well darling just give me one more chance
[02:08.95]And I'll give you everything I have
[02:12.05]I'll try to be a better man
[02:15.39]I've been up and I've been down
[02:18.69]Ain't that just what love's about
[02:21.70]You took the words right out my mouth
[02:24.99]If you feel it say it now
[02:28.11]It's been a while but I figured it out
[02:31.31]But ain't that just what love's about
[02:34.43]You took the words right out my mouth
[02:37.65]But if you feel it say it now
[02:41.35]How do you lose the one you love
[02:44.09]After giving it all you gave it up
[02:47.35]Well maybe my love wasn't enough
[02:50.62]You think you know but you never can
[02:53.86]And how do you lose your only plan
[02:56.99]Well darling just give me one more chance
[03:00.33]And I'll give you everything I have
[03:03.57]I'll try to be a better man
data.trans:
[ti:Better Man]
[ar:Westlife]
[al:Better Man]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.28]//
[00:02.57]//
[00:03.86]你我之间有种难以言明的情愫
[00:10.25]似乎这只会在电影场景中出现 我知道
[00:16.71]近来 你的身影疯狂涌入我的脑海
[00:20.78]//
[00:23.07]为何要让曾走进你心的我徘徊于你的心门之外
[00:29.46]总是会众人皆乐而我暗自神伤
[00:32.66]但我不觉得这是明智之举
[00:35.80]有时候我只是想安静的独处片刻
[00:38.66]反思我这一生 回想你与我的故事
[00:42.70]为何你会残忍地放手所爱
[00:45.45]决绝地放弃你曾付出的一切
[00:48.94]或许是因为我给你的爱还不够
[00:52.06]你还以为你会明白 但其实你不曾明白
[00:55.40]为何你会放弃生命的唯一
[00:58.42]亲爱的 就再给我一次机会吧
[01:01.68]我愿为你付出一切 倾尽所有
[01:04.83]我只想做那个与你更合称的人
[01:11.57]我们赤诚相见的那刻 我能感觉到你的真心
[01:17.82]窥见天使的身影而她的翅膀早已隐藏 我知道
[01:24.25]每个人都与众不同
[01:27.81]//
[01:30.56]而唯独你入我的梦境 
[01:36.74]总是会众人皆乐而我暗自神伤
[01:39.84]但我不觉得这是明智之举
[01:42.91]有时候我只是想安静的独处片刻
[01:45.79]反思我这一生 回想你与我的故事
[01:49.74]为何你会残忍的放手所爱
[01:52.61]决绝的放弃你曾付出的一切
[01:56.10]或许是因为我给你的爱还不够
[01:59.22]你还以为你会明白 但其实你不曾明白
[02:02.54]为何你会放弃生命的唯一
[02:05.70]亲爱的 就再给我一次机会吧
[02:08.95]我愿为你付出一切 倾尽所有
[02:12.05]我只想做那个与你更合称的人
[02:15.39]经历过人生的起落沉浮
[02:18.69]难道我们之间还不算爱么
[02:21.70]你默契的说出我想说的话
[02:24.99]如果你对我有感觉 就说出来吧
[02:28.11]后知后觉的我才恍然明白
[02:31.31]难道我们之间还不算爱么
[02:34.43]你默契的说出我想说的话
[02:37.65]如果你对我有感觉 就说出来吧
[02:41.35]为何你会残忍的放手所爱
[02:44.09]决绝的放弃你曾付出的一切
[02:47.35]或许是因为我给你的爱还不够
[02:50.62]你还以为你会明白 但其实你不曾明白
[02:53.86]为何你会放弃生命的唯一
[02:56.99]亲爱的 就再给我一次机会吧
[03:00.33]我愿为你付出一切 倾尽所有
[03:03.57]我只想做那个与你更合称的人
